data.title: Crypto Hedge Funds are Outperforming Following Bitcoin's Decline Since November
data.text: Crypto hedge funds backed by a basket of digital assets outperformed Bitcoin last month as the world's leading cryptocurrency fell hard from its peak price.

data.title: CryptoGames: Offering Bitcoin and Altcoin casino games
data.text: CryptoGames, owned by MuchGaming B.V, is an exclusive crypto casino that is operating online for a good couple of years now. Over time, it rapidly became the top and first choice for gamblers from around the world.

data.title: Dorsey And Jay-Z's Blind Trust To Fund Bitcoin Development Reveals Board Members
data.text: The 500 BTC blind trust announced its board of directors. Back in February, Jack Dorsey and Jay-Z created the ₿trust with a clear mission.

data.title: Bitcoin Spikes to $49,000 as Fed Leaves Interest Rates Unchanged

data.title: Crypto Lender Ledn Raises $70M in Series B Round, Readies Bitcoin-Backed Mortgage Product
data.text: The crypto lender is looking to reach over $100 million in bitcoin-backed mortgage originations.

data.title: Bitcoin rallies above $49K following Fed FOMC announcement of rate hikes in 2022
data.text: Bitcoin price action receives a welcome boost to $49,000 shortly after the Fed confirms rate hikes and a reduction of its bond purchasing policy in 2022.

data.title: Bitcoin struggles to hold $47K as Fed meeting adds to 'extreme' BTC market panic
data.text: Commentators brace for upheaval as Fed officials prepare to reveal future financial policy moves.

data.title: Markets rally after FOMC meeting, but Bitcoin bears still have a short-term advantage
data.text: Bitcoin, altcoins and stocks rallied shortly after the Fed laid out its policy roadmap for 2022, but bears still have an advantage in this week $755 million options expiry.

data.title: Analysts expect Bitcoin trend change after Fed lays out its 2022 roadmap
data.text: Traders look for a market-wide recovery now that the Fed confirmed at least 3 rate hikes and a wind down of its bond purchasing policy in 2022.

data.title: CoinMarketCap glitch lists bitcoin at $799 billion, but Coinbase beats that astronomical price as its own crypto data goes nuts
data.text: Tweets showed bitcoin's price on CoinMarketCap at $799 billion per coin, giving it a market value of $14.7 quintillion.

data.title: Bitcoin, Stocks Bounce Back After Fed Signals Interest Rate Hikes
data.text: Bitcoin and stock markets recouped some of their earlier losses after the Federal Reserve projected three interest rate increases in 2022.

data.title: Crypto Firm Ledn Raises $70M for Bitcoin-Backed Mortgages
data.text: Crypto savings and loan platform Ledn is preparing the world's first Bitcoin-backed mortgage offering after raising $70 million.

data.title: Crypto lender Ledn raises $70 million, announces new bitcoin-backed mortgage product
data.text: Crypto lending firm Ledn has raised $70 million in a Series B funding round and is now valued at $540 million. The post Crypto lender Ledn raises $70 million, announces new bitcoin-backed mortgage product appeared first on The Block.

data.title: Bitcoin Trends Could Provide Clues About Future
data.text: Heavy selling pressure has seen Bitcoin slide from its all-time high of almost $69,000 on Nov. 11. What are some of the broader factors in the cryptocurrency landscape that traders are watching closely?

data.title: Bitcoin Should Hold Around $40,000 Novogratz Says
data.text: Billionaire Mike Novogratz, founder of Galaxy Digital, says Bitcoin prices should hold around $40,000. He speaks with Bloomberg's Sonali Basak on "Bloomberg Markets.

data.title: Block, Formerly Square, To Let Users Give The Gift Of Bitcoin This Holiday Season
data.text: Block Inc's SQ Cash App users can give the gift of Bitcoin to their loved ones, this holiday season.

data.title: Block's Cash App to Allow its 40M Customers to Gift Bitcoin
data.text: Jack Dorsey's payment firm Block, previously called Square, has unveiled a new Cash App feature that will allow users to gift family and friends crypto and stock over the holiday season.

data.title: Bitcoin 'Should Hold' USD 40K, Says Novogratz. If Not - It's a ‘Buying Opportunity,' Argues Kraken CEO
data.text: A bitcoin (BTC) price of under USD 40,000 would be a “buying opportunity,” and the US dollar is “going to zero,” Jesse Powell, CEO of crypto exchange Kraken said in a new interview. Meanwhile, Galaxy Digital CEO Mike Novogratz said the market is in a “healthy” correction, and that a BTC price of USD 40,000 “should hold.”
